name: SpookyTrate
description:
===========Spooky Trade===========

Your friends invited you to go for one spooky "Trick or Trate".

You all are going up hill to the spooky old manision which abandoned for a long time.

There's some lights insid....so...maybe we got some luck!

============Attention============

* This is a PCVR game, you need VRheadset and SteamVR to play.

* Really sorry to infrom that my project file damaged and I can not save Level1 つ﹏⊂. I may try to recreate it in another day after jam ended.    sorry!

* I'm still learning on puzzle game designing. If you have any problem or need some help, please feel free to send me message ^_^
